workshoptitle: Simple Oracle Document Access (SODA) using Python

tutorials.title: Prerequisites
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable).

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Simple Oracle Document Access (SODA).

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Build Python application using SODA and JSON
tutorials.description: This lab shows how easy it is to build a simple Python application that uses JSON documents from MongoDB Cloud Atlas and Oracle Autonomous JSON Database using SODA APIs.
